channel.title: ..::RevealedX::.. Economy Based - v2.0 [DEVELOPMENT]
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i45.servimg.com/u/f45/16/65/23/76/reveal10.png[/img]
Welcome to the RevealedX Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.
[b][u]Information about RevealedX:[/b] We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new outlook at RevealedX. We have just completed of changing from a PK/Spawn server to an Economy based server. I personally feel that I didn't take the right approach, as I usually do not. As I said, we are taking a step back in the development process and are looking to develop the server more, then re-release. We have over 90 registered users on our forums, as well as reaching a peak of 21 players in-game. We are hosted on an offshore VPS, hosted in the UK.
Server Promo Vid - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rDZbPJJxGZc
[b][u]Server Goals:[/b] • Create the most stable server possible. • Create one of the best economys known to exist. • Create a large dedicated player base. • Add features that have never been seen before. • Create a genuinley coded server. • Create a staff member base that genuinely loves the game.
[b][u]Server Features:[/b] • Full summoning with BoB. • Fully re-done Dungeoneering System, with 5 floors. • Decent player base. • Terminated most memory leaks. • Added 3 bosses that most servers overlook. (Mutant-Tarn, Sea Troll Queen, Barrelchest) • Added a raiding system. • Custom ::yelltag's • All 614 Items • 525 Models • Added an efficient Activity Points System. • Spirit Shield effects. • Re-did NpcDrops using an event manager. • Added 2 additional Donator Ranks • Added new DH system with a manager. • All extreme potions • Overloads • Rocktail effects • Fixed prayer draining. • Added special restore potions as well as super prayer potions • Re-did Godwars. • A LOT MORE!
[b][u]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/home-8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/specs2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/wg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/wc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/teleports.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/dueling-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/equip.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/donortab-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/clanchat.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/agility.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/fletching.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/mining-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/summoning-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/agility-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/seatroll.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/tarn.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i565.photobucket.com/albums/ss99/glnowaitgf/torm.jpg[/img]
[b]Positions Available:[/b]
[b][u]Server Programmer[/b] (2/2) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the source itself. Must be an experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a day, with no maximum.
[b][u]Client Programmer[/b] (1/1) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the client itself. Must be an experienced coder, with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a day, with no maximum.
[b][u]Forum Moderator[/b] (1/2) - A user who: - Works well with other users - Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users - Manages forums well - Creates a clean and safe environment for all users - Is able to punish other users - A user who does not take preference Must work a minimum of 2 hours a day, with no maximum.
[b]Application Format:[/b]
[code]Name: IGN: Age: Position applying for: Secondary Position if not chosen for the first position: Hours Available: Time Zone: Experience: Proof of Work(if applies): Capability with Coding(if applies): MSN: Skype (optional): Other contact (optional):[/code][/center]

item.title: ..::RevealedX::.. Economy Based - v2.0 [DEVELOPMENT]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[center]

reveal10.png1024×200

Welcome to the RevealedX Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.

[u]Information about RevealedX:
We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new
outlook at RevealedX. We have just completed of changing from a PK/Spawn server to an
Economy based server. I personally feel that I didn’t take the right approach, as I
usually do not. As I said, we are taking a step back in the development process and are
looking to develop the server more, then re-release. We have over 90 registered users on
our forums, as well as reaching a peak of 21 players in-game. We are hosted on an
offshore VPS, hosted in the UK.

Server Promo Vid - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rDZbPJJxGZc

[u]Server Goals:
• Create the most stable server possible.
• Create one of the best economys known to exist.
• Create a large dedicated player base.
• Add features that have never been seen before.
• Create a genuinley coded server.
• Create a staff member base that genuinely loves the game.

[u]Server Features:
• Full summoning with BoB.
• Fully re-done Dungeoneering System, with 5 floors.
• Decent player base.
• Terminated most memory leaks.
• Added 3 bosses that most servers overlook. (Mutant-Tarn, Sea Troll Queen, Barrelchest)
• Added a raiding system.
• Custom ::yelltag’s
• All 614 Items
• 525 Models
• Added an efficient Activity Points System.
• Spirit Shield effects.
• Re-did NpcDrops using an event manager.
• Added 2 additional Donator Ranks
• Added new DH system with a manager.
• All extreme potions
• Overloads
• Rocktail effects
• Fixed prayer draining.
• Added special restore potions as well as super prayer potions
• Re-did Godwars.
• A LOT MORE!

[u]Media:

specs2.png562×569







clanchat.png755×500




summoning-1.png760×503




Positions Available:

[u]Server Programmer (2/2) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the source itself. Must be an
experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Client Programmer (1/1) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the client itself. Must be an
experienced coder, with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Forum Moderator (1/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users
  • Manages forums well
  • Creates a clean and safe environment for all users
  • Is able to punish other users
  • A user who does not take preference
    Must work a minimum of 2 hours a day, with no maximum.

Application Format:

Name: IGN: Age: Position applying for: Secondary Position if not chosen for the first position: Hours Available: Time Zone: Experience: Proof of Work(if applies): Capability with Coding(if applies): MSN: Skype (optional): Other contact (optional):[/center]

Read full topic
